pr_title: Add Service Account Configuration to GCP Marketplace Schema

timeline.message:
Fix docker skip deployer circle ci

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Add service account logic for importer and grpc in marketplace

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Cleaned up a little

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Add service account logic for importer and grpc in marketplace

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Cleaned up a little

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.author: steven-sheehy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,36 +69,49 @@ properties:
     type: string
     x-google-marketplace:
       type: NAMESPACE
-  deployer.image:
-    type: string
-    x-google-marketplace:
-      type: DEPLOYER_IMAGE
   grpc.config.hedera.mirror.grpc.db.password:
     type: string
     default: ''
-    description: The grpc user password
-    title: grpc user password
+    description: The gRPC database user password
+    title: gRPC database user password
     x-google-marketplace:
       type: MASKED_FIELD
   grpc.replicas:
     type: integer
     default: 1
-    description: Number of grpc node replicas
+    description: Number of gRPC node replicas
     title: gRPC replicas
     minimum: 0
     maximum: 10
+  grpc.serviceAccount.name:
+    type: string
+    title: gRPC Service Account
+    description: Service account to assign to gRPC StatefulSet

timeline.author: steven-sheehy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -69,36 +69,49 @@ properties:
     type: string
     x-google-marketplace:
       type: NAMESPACE
-  deployer.image:
-    type: string
-    x-google-marketplace:
-      type: DEPLOYER_IMAGE
   grpc.config.hedera.mirror.grpc.db.password:
     type: string
     default: ''
-    description: The grpc user password
-    title: grpc user password
+    description: The gRPC database user password
+    title: gRPC database user password
     x-google-marketplace:
       type: MASKED_FIELD
   grpc.replicas:
     type: integer
     default: 1
-    description: Number of grpc node replicas
+    description: Number of gRPC node replicas
     title: gRPC replicas
     minimum: 0
     maximum: 10
+  grpc.serviceAccount.name:
+    type: string
+    title: gRPC Service Account
+    description: Service account to assign to gRPC StatefulSet
+    x-google-marketplace:
+      type: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
+      serviceAccount:
+        roles:
+          - type: ClusterRole

timeline.author: steven-sheehy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -108,6 +121,23 @@ properties:
     title: importer replicas
     minimum: 1
     maximum: 10
+  importer.serviceAccount.name:
+    type: string
+    title: Importer Service Account
+    description: Service account to assign to Importer StatefulSet
+    x-google-marketplace:
+      type: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
+      serviceAccount:
+        roles:
+          - type: ClusterRole

timeline.author: steven-sheehy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -108,6 +121,23 @@ properties:
     title: importer replicas
     minimum: 1
     maximum: 10
+  importer.serviceAccount.name:
+    type: string
+    title: Importer Service Account
+    description: Service account to assign to Importer StatefulSet
+    x-google-marketplace:
+      type: SERVICE_ACCOUNT
+      serviceAccount:
+        roles:
+          - type: ClusterRole
+            rulesType: CUSTOM
+            rules:
+              - apiGroups: ['']
+                resources: ['configmaps']
+                verbs: ['get', 'list','watch', 'create']
